summary: An archer conpanion that is based off a character in Imaginaughts, My own series (Link to page in description)
descriptionHtml:
http://imaginaughts.wikia.com/wiki/Varralia_Arenian

In Imaginaughts, Varralia is a Dragoneer and wife to the King of the Aefian Empire.

In Skyrim, since Dragoons don't exist, she is a marryable, archer conpanion, found in the whiterun barracks. She levels up with you.

This is my first mod. I'm not very good at modding, and if you want to do a request, you can find the tutorial I followed here: http://hubpages.com/hub/Hot-to-Turn-Your-Skyrim-Character-into-a-Follower .
author: Golden_Flame0
